thread.section_title: Paris Marriott Opera Ambassador Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great Property as expected
thread.title_full: Great Property as expected - Review of Paris Marriott Opera Ambassador Hotel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Mark Y
title: Great Property as expected
text:
We stayed here on a recent weekend to Paris. Good location and walkable distance to the Louvre (20 mins), and the gare du nord (25 mins).
As expected with the Marriott brand the standards are pretty consistant with subtle differences from city to city.
Front desk staff were very polite and helpful. Concierge and bar staff not so much.
We had a suite so not much to say here clearly. The room was very large and had the comforts you would expect from a suite at this level of property.
The breakfast buffet is average only. We expected more when comparing with other Marrirotts in Germany and The Netherlands. Nothing special here.
We would stay here again
